item.title: Enable XML for Android App access to Wordpress
item.description: If you get an error when configuring Wordpress app for Android, log into your WordPress blog and in the admin area go to Settings -> Writing and under Remote Publishing you’ll see a checkbox for XML-RPC. Check that, click ‘Save Changes’ and XML-RPC services will be turned on for your blog.
